src:
Finish Empat Besar Tidak Mustahil untuk Manchester United
06 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penyerang Manchester United, Marcus Rashford angkat bicara terkait peluang timnya finish di zona Liga Champions di akhir musim. Rashford mengatakan bahwa timnya masih berpotensi untuk finish di empat besar meski itu bakal menjadi tugas yang sulit bagi mereka.
Musim ini Manchester United menargetkan untuk kembali ke zona Liga Champions. Hal ini dikarenakan musim lalu mereka finish di peringkat enam sehingga mereka hanya bermain di Liga Europa musim ini.
Namun di awal musim ini, performa United cukup mengkhawatirkan. Mereka saat ini hanya menempati peringkat 10 klasemen sementara EPL, terpaut 10 poin dari peringkat empat.
Rashford sendiri meyakini bahwa posisi empat besar masih bisa diraih oleh timnya di akhir musim nanti. "Memang untuk finish di empat besar akan cukup sulit, namun saya rasa itu tidak mustahil sama sekali," beber Rashford kepada Sky Sports.

Baca komentar lengkap sang striker di bawah ini.
text:
Finish the Big Four Not Impossible for Manchester United
Nov 6 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford spoke out about his team's chances of finishing in the Champions League zone at the end of the season. Rashford said that his team still had the potential to finish in the top four even though it would be a difficult task for them.
This season Manchester United are targeting to return to the Champions League zone. This is because last season they finished sixth so they only played in the Europa League this season.
But at the beginning of this season, United's performance was quite alarming. They currently only rank 10th in the EPL standings, 10 points adrift of fourth.
Rashford himself believes that the top four positions can still be won by his team at the end of the season. "Indeed, to finish in the top four will be quite difficult, but I think it is not impossible at all," Rashford told Sky Sports.

Read the striker's full comments below.
